title: Despicable.Me.2.2013.SWEDiSH.FiNNiSH.ENG.DVDR-TheLonelyOne

  IMDB..............: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1690953

  PLOT:
  While Gru, the ex-supervillain is adjusting to family life and an attempted honest living in the jam business,
  a secret Arctic laboratory is stolen. The Anti-Villain League decides it needs an insider's help and recruits Gru in the investigation.
  Together with the eccentric AVL agent, Lucy Wilde, Gru concludes that his prime suspect is the presumed dead supervillain,
  El Macho, whose his teenage son is also making the moves on his eldest daughter, Margo.
  Seemingly blinded by his overprotectiveness of his children and his growing mutual attraction to Lucy,
  Gru seems on the wrong track even as his minions are being quietly kidnapped en masse for some malevolent purpose.

  Notes:
  
  Something wrong with the last one but here comes a new.. :)

  Maximum respect to LEvEL, CSG, TFTT, M4U and other groups that give the scene a
  fight for who's the best swecustom group. And a big thanks to all translators swesub.nu...
